column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I was on spring break from school and decided to come home for the week .
#id=2
#text=I did n't have a car so I had to the train .
#id=3
#text=I packed a small bag and took a cab to the train station .
#id=4
#text=I went up to the window and bought a ticket to my hometown .
#id=5
#text=I decided to buy a few snacks and magazines that local vendors were selling while I waited for the train .
#id=6
#text=It came time to board the train and I grabbed my things .
#id=7
#text=I got on the train and sat down by the window seat so that I can enjoy the view .
#id=8
#text=The train announced it 's next destination and started to take off .
#id=9
#text=The conductor came down the aisles and was checking everyone 's ticket .
#text=I had my ticket ready and handed him my ticket when he got to me .
#text=I got comfortable and started to read a magazine while waiting to arrive at my destination .
#text=Awhile later the train had arrived at my hometown .
#text=I got off the train and met my parents outside the train station who came to pick me up .
